body:
Hi all...

This is the last time I've been here since December 2013. Last 3 years ago (from now), I been into Avicus for the first time for PVP and met some new friends. I've attacked some players, but spam kills are useless for me. Right now, I am fully unsupported in this server for now. There is no way you can find me back.

I can't join on tournaments, I can't be on for long, you guys will miss me.

Here's a list of my previous usernames:
- MadTG (since Jan 2017)
- MadTheGamer (since Mar 2016)
- MadPoseidon182 (since Dec 2013, but original name)


And the support status for this server for me:
MadPoseidon182 - iiDecade

Start Date:
December 2013
End of Support:
November 2017

Sometimes, I honestly made some mistakes, don't know what to do, I've been argued a few times. Web bans are the worst thing for me because I didn't follow any rules. I only go on Avicus for a bit.  (e.g. less hours, etc.) If any of you are my friends, then you will miss me a lot. I'm sorry to say this, but I, iiDecade, has decided to leave this server for good due to inactivity of this server.

I am not quite active enough, but only in other areas. I just wanted to say thank you all for sticking with me and its memes. I know that 2017 has been quite an awesome year for me and everyone else, but I won't come back in 2018 or later. 

This server has been a good server, I enjoy making friends with everyone, and in the server (including Discord and TeamSpeak), but I will be on Discord only till Mid 2018.

I enjoyed Avicus a lot, I played it a lot, and this was enough for me.


If you want to see me, add me on discord:
Click my profile. You can see the discord link. I can be added as your friend if you wanted to.

This is the lost decade, but unsupported in the next decade (2027) and furthermore.


Thank you.
-iiDecade

title: No more Decade...
